author: makortel
body:
This PR merges `PixelTracks_2017_cff` to `PixelTracks_cff` as mentioned in RECO meeting on June 16
https://indico.cern.ch/event/645986/contributions/2623365/attachments/1478282/2290968/slides_reco_20170616.pdf
I also had to do additional cleanup in initialStep to make the CA quadruplets the default `initialStepHitQuadruplets` module as otherwise workflows not having `trackingPhase1` or `trackingPhase2PU140` would crash because of the clone in `PixelTracks_cff` that assumes the original module to be CA quadruplets. Ok, this cleanup should have been done anyway as the CA quadruplets is the default for both phase1 and phase2.

Tested in CMSSW_9_3_X_2017-07-13-1100, should have no physics impact.

@rovere @VinInn
title: Cleanup pixel tracking configurations
